sentences.en: ...a family who could trace their ancestry back to the sixteenth century.
sentences.cn: …一个家世能追溯回16世纪的家庭。

sentences.en: Danforth and Poinar's fossil proides strong eidence for a more remote ancestry.
sentences.cn: DanforthandPoinar发现的化石为一种更为遥远的祖先提供了有力的证据.

sentences.en: He cames of a good ancestry.
He was very proud of his old Virginian ancestry.
sentences.cn: 他对于他那久远的弗吉尼亚的家谱很引以自豪.

sentences.en: His family included British ancestry and he learned English before Spanish.
sentences.cn: 他的家人有着英国血统,相应的他在西班牙语之前先学会了英语.

sentences.en: I intend that all related to my tapestry of ancestry ascend.
sentences.cn: 我意愿与我祖先织锦有关的所有人都提升.

sentences.en: I intend to forgive anything that my ancestry perpetrated that harmed another.
sentences.cn: 我意愿宽恕我祖先犯下的、伤害他人的任何行径.

sentences.en: Martin has shown that, of the eukaryotic genes whose ancestry can be traced, 75 per cent or more came from bacteria rather than the host cell.
sentences.cn: 马丁揭示，在哪些可以追溯到祖先的线粒体基因上，有75%或更多的成分来自当时外来的细菌而非宿主细胞。

sentences.en: Most people of European or African ancestry have the "wet" kind: thick and sticky.
sentences.cn: 大多数欧洲或者非洲血统的人耳垢是湿的，厚的，有粘性的。

sentences.en: She had prejudices on the side of ancestry ; she had a value for rank and consequence.
sentences.cn: 她有些偏爱名门贵族,尊崇高官厚位.

sentences.en: The family has traced its ancestry to the Norman invaders.
sentences.cn: 这个家族将自己的世系追溯到诺曼征服者.

sentences.en: The larger of the two studies involved New Yorkers Ashkenazi Jewish ancestry.
sentences.cn: 两项研究中较大的包括德系犹太人祖先的新纽约州人.

sentences.en: The origin of vertebrates and their ancestry are problems still obscured by too few facts.
sentences.cn: 脊椎动物的起源和它们的始祖问题,由于事实太少仍然不很清楚.

sentences.en: Their ancestry settled the land in 1856.
sentences.cn: 他们的祖辈1856年在这块土地上定居下来.

sentences.en: They traced their ancestry back to George Washington.
sentences.cn: 他们的祖先可追溯至乔治·华盛顿.

sentences.en: You can only explain this by evolutionary common ancestry.
sentences.cn: 你只能通过存在“进化上的共同祖先”来解释。

words.tran_cn: 女性祖先；女性被继承人

trans.tran_en: the members of your family who lived a long time ago
